text: DWPR (1296 kHz) Radyo Asenso is an AM radio station owned and operated by Radio Corporation of the Philippines. The station's studio is located along Gonzales St., Brgy. Bonuan Boquig, Dagupan City, and its transmitter is located in Brgy. Bolosan, Dagupan City. It is one of the RCP-owned stations that have affiliated with the Radio Mindanao Network, together with DZLT in Lucena and DXOC in Ozamiz.Mediaman killed in road crashPangasinan radio commentator pretended he died to dupe attackerFormer MECO chairman accused of libel before Pangasinan RTCFrustrated murder complaint filed vs. suspects in shooting of Pangasinan journoGuv files libel cases vs. 4 radio commentatorsNewsman survives gun slay ==References== Category:Radio stations in Dagupan Category:Radio stations established in 1978 Category:News and talk radio stations in the Philippines
title: DWPR-AM
